TITLE: U.S. House Speaker Kevin McCarthy pledges to tackle immigration, 'woke' education policies and IRS funding
SUMMARY: Newly elected House Speaker Kevin McCarthy said he wants to "be the check and provide some balance" to President Joe Biden's policies.

SUMMARY: Republican representatives said Sunday they are not worried that Kevin McCarthy gave up too much in order to secure the gavel.

SUMMARY: Brazilian stocks are expected to plunge on Monday after supporters of right-wing former president Jair Bolsonaro stormed government buildings on Sunday in protest against his election loss.

TITLE: 'We were duped': How George Santos raised money from wealthy GOP donors while lying about his resume
SUMMARY: Congressman George Santos "duped" wealthy donors to contribute to his campaign. The lies helped his 2022 political groups raise nearly $3 million.
